lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Angels slugger Albert Pujols had surgery on his right foot Friday, possibly sidelining him past opening day.

headline.print_headline: Angels' Pujols Has Foot Surgery, Could Be Sidelined 4 Months
headline.main: Angels' Pujols Has Foot Surgery, Could Be Sidelined 4 Months

snippet: Los Angeles Angels slugger Albert Pujols had surgery on his right foot Friday, possibly sidelining him past opening day....
